review: This is an excellent device if you want to use KODI (formerly XBMC). I live in Canada so I have not tried many of the other features as I don't know if they are available to Canadians but it is a quick, stable box if you want to use it for media streaming!
author: ChaJazz

review: I'm very pleased with the Amazon Fire TV. In the country we don't have the luxury of TV signals or cable companies, and not wanting to pay the high prices of satellite choices this has worked well on my non-smart TV.I'm pleased with the simple remote, and so much faster on search when the cursor is allowed to wrap to the next line instead of having to go back. All options are easily accessible.I'm not a techno wizard, and for me this was an easy set up and use!
author: Relias "JAS's Stuff"
